About.paragraph: I am Minu Gupta and have a total experience of more than 8 years in financial advisory. My goal is to give proper advice to the customer. After seeing far too many deals in the COVID, I decided to go online and explain why insurance is so important in our lives. My suggestion is to give me one chance to give my ideas regarding the finances, which is completely free of cost.
Why: LIC plan provides financial protection to the family of the insured in case of an unfortunate demise of the insured person
Why2: LIC comes with the sovereign guarantee of the Indian Government, which makes its offerings a safe and reliable investment.
Tax Benefits – Policy holders can enjoy tax deductions on the premium amount under Section 80C and maturity under Section 10(10D) of the Income Tax Act, 1961.
Compulsory savings habit for a very long term.
People still choose LIC over other risk oriented financial products.

Services.name: Endowment Plans
Services.text: LIC New Endowment Plan is a participating non-linked plan which offers an attractive combination of protection and saving features. This combination provides financial support for the family of the deceased policyholder any time before maturity

Services.name: Whole Life Plans
Services.text: LIC Jeevan Umang plan offers a combination of income and protection to your family. This plan provides for annual survival benefits from the end of the premium paying term till maturity and a lump sum payment at the time of maturity or on death of the policyholder during the policy term.

Services.name: Children Plans
Services.text: ffers a combination of income and protection to your family. This plan provides for annual survival benefits from the end of the premium paying term till maturity and a lump sum payment at the time of maturity or on death of the policyholder during the policy term.

Services.name: Money Back Plans
Services.text: participating non-linked plan which offers an attractive combination of protection against death throughout the term of the plan along with the periodic payment on survival at specified durations during the term. This unique combination provides financial support for the family of the deceased policyholder any time before maturity

Services.name: Ulip Plans
Services.text: ULIP or Unit Linked Plan is basically a combination of investment as well as insurance. Lic ULIP gives the benefits of both investment and insurance to the investor under a single integrated plan.

Services.name: Single Premium Plans
Services.text: LIC Single Premium Endowment Plan (T-917) is a savings cum protection plan, where premium is paid in lump sum at the outset of the policy. This combination provides financial protection against death during the policy term with the provision of payment of lump-sum at the end of the selected policy term in case of his/her survival.

Services.name: Term Plans
Services.text: LIC Jeevan Amar plan is a Non-Linked, Without Profit, pure protection plan. The plan offers the flexibility to choose from two death benefit options viz: Level Sum Assured and increasing Sum Assured. Under this plan, there are two categories of premium rates viz (1) Non-Smoker rates and (2) Smoker rates. Also lower premium rates will be available for female proposers.

Services.name: Pension Plans
Services.text: Plans are specialized insurance plans that provide a steady flow of income after your retirement. Every person aims at saving enough and living a financially secured retirement life. Therefore, LIC has launched some annuity plans that offer dual benefits of insurance and investment.

Services.name: Health Plans
Services.text: Health Insurance is an insurance to cover the medical expenses incurred by an individual during hospitalization. The LIC Health plan provides financial support to you and your family by paying specific amounts towards hospitalization expenses.

Features.title: LIC (Life Insurance Corporation)
Features.text: LIC is the top insurance company in the country which provides endownment plans, whole life plans, pension plan, money back plan etc

Features.title: Star Health Insurance
Features.text: Star Health Insurance laid its foundation stone in the year 2006 with its business interest in health insurance, personal accident and overseas mediclaim policy. It offers a wide range of Star health insurance plans tailored to fulfil the needs and requirements of their consumers.

Features.title: United India Insurance
Features.text: United Insurance provides the insurance related to 2 wheelers, 4 wheelers, property insurance etc. United India Insurance Company is a leading Indian nationalised general insurance company, under the ownership of Ministry of Finance, Government of India. Headquartered in Chennai, India
